title: Catch
description: Tamsen Parsons is happy with her wacky world. So she leases fish to big business, her bedroom resembles a gypsy fortune-teller’s caravan and she’s got the roomie from hell. Still, the sun’s shining and she can smile.That is until uptight lawyer Matthew Solomon rolls in like a storm. He’s over the corporate climb, unsure what he wants in life anymore and the sexy and cheerful Tamsen is exactly the short-term tonic he needs.What Matt doesn’t count on is his interfering mother, Tamsen’s out-of-control best friend and falling in love.Can a gypsy fish-minder really bring this bad-boy to heel?
author: Toni Kenyon
